thumb.title: The lava whales in our game are truly terrifying!
thumb.description: The lava whales in our game are truly terrifying!Ohayo Gianthook!Hey #gamedevs Share your game with us! #WishlistWednesday🍀💬Comment with your #indiegames here❤️Like✅ Follow🔖Add other games to your steam wishlist!#simulation #meme #gaming #steam #indiegame #IndieGameDevhttps://store.steampowered.com/app/3690550/OHAYO_GIANTHOOK_Monster_Fishing_Adventure/?curator_clanid=45095802
